00045 struct deleteVectorIteratorData
00046 {
00047   template< typename T >
00048   void operator()( const T& a ) const
00049   {
00050     delete *a;
00051   }
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00056 struct deleteMapIteratorData
00057 {
00058   template< typename T >
00059   void operator()( const T& a ) const
00060   {
00061     delete a.second;
00062   }
00063 };
00064 
00065 
00068 struct lessXYZOp
00069 {
00070   template< typename T >
00071   bool operator()( const T& a, const T& b ) const
00072   {
00073     return ( (a.x < b.x)
00074              || !(b.x < a.x) && ((a.y < b.y)
00075                                  || !(b.y < a.y) && (a.z < b.z) ));
00076   }
00077 };
00078 
00079 
00081 struct triId
00082 {
00083      void* pri;
00084      int pri_idx;
00085 };
00086 
00087 
00088 
00092 struct lessTriOp
00093 {
00094   template< typename T >
00095   bool operator()( const T& a, const T& b ) const
00096   {
00097     return ( (a.pri < b.pri) ||
00098              !(b.pri < a.pri) && (a.pri_idx < b.pri_idx) );
00099   }
00100 };
00101 
00102 
00105 struct lessUVOp
00106 {
00107   template< typename T >
00108   bool operator()( const T& a, const T& b ) const
00109   {
00110     return ( (a.u < b.u) ||
00111             !(b.u < a.u) && (a.v < b.v) );
00112 //      return ( (a.u < b.u) || !(b.u < a.u) && (a.v < b.v) );
00113   }
00114 };
